addon.news: v0.0.1 (2016-11-04) - Initial commit v0.0.2 (2016-11-08) - Added icon v0.0.3 (2016-11-09) - Modify 'Last Played' addon (in addition to Exodus); changed icon v0.0.4 (2017-01-18) - Added an option to download each movie into its own folder or not v0.0.5 (2017-02-04) - Updated the modification of the Exodus and Last Played addons v0.0.6 (2017-03-20) - Added the option to update the library after each download finishes v0.0.7 (2017-03-20) - Fixed a typo ('local_movies_folder' --> 'update_library') v0.0.8 (2017-04-03) - Cleaned up code; modify Exodus download settings (if necessary) v0.0.9 (2017-04-04) - Automatically modify Exodus using Kodi Callbacks (if installed) v0.0.10 (2017-04-04) - Fixed a typo v0.0.11 (2017-04-04) - String formatting v0.0.12 (2017-04-04) - Make sure the remote Kodi is available before trying to download v0.0.13 (2017-05-08) - Don't start the download unless 'Confirm' is selected (hitting the back button won't start it) v0.0.14 (2017-06-03) - Display 'Remote Downloader' as the title of the yes/no dialog, not the title v0.0.15 (2017-07-31) - Now also works with Covenant and Elysium v0.0.16 (2017-07-31) - Modify the 'Default action' setting for Covenant and Elysium v0.0.17 (2017-08-02) - Download the current stream (requires defining a keymap) v0.0.18 (2017-08-02) - Fixed downloading of current stream v0.0.19 (2017-08-02) - Improved handling of media info v0.0.20 (2017-08-02) - Get a stream's thumbnail v0.0.21 (2017-08-10) - Don't overwrite an existing file v0.0.22 (2017-08-10) - Include the year in movie filenames
